message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a special price of $20,000. It's a fantastic deal for something of this value.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a budget to stick to.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $20,000 is already a steal for this product.  I could meet you halfway at $16,000, but that's my best offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to stay within my budget.
